name: NO_FAULTS
info: Disables vehicle part faults.  If true, disables vehicle part faults, vehicle parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, and can only be repaired via replacement.

name: NO_NPC_FOOD
info: Disables tracking food, thirst and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs.  If true, NPCs won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, not to get penalties.

name: NO_VITAMINS
info: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.  If true, disables vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.

name: CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED
info: Enables CBM slots mechanics.  If true CBM slots are enabled.

name: DISABLE_ANIMAL_CLASH
info: Disable additional spawn of large groups of monsters fighting each other on swamps.

name: PORTAL_STORM_IGNORE_NPC
info: Portal storm enemies will ignore NPCs no matter what.

name: CRAZY
info: A boolean specifically for Crazy Cataclysm.

name: STATS_THROUGH_KILLS
info: Stats through Kills.  A mod that allows your stats to increase by killing zombies.

name: GENERIC_PROFESSION_ID
info: The profession selected by default in the character creator menu.

name: GENERIC_SCENARIO_ID
info: The scenario selected by default in the character creator menu.

name: WORKBENCH_ALL_OPTIONS
info: If false, examining workbench-type furniture will auto-execute pickup and undeploy (where applicable) actions, no crafting-related options will be listed.

name: SELECT_STARTING_CITY
info: Allows to select starting city in new character menu.

name: OVERMAP_PREGENERATED_PATH
info: Path to pregenerated overmap files.  Should include mod folder name and folder where omap files are stored.

name: OVERMAP_POPULATE_OUTSIDE_CONNECTIONS_FROM_NEIGHBORS
info: Allows to populate outside connections from neighbors.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_RIVERS
info: Allows to place procgen rivers during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_LAKES
info: Allows to place procgen lakes during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_FORESTS
info: Allows to place procgen forests during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_SWAMPS
info: Allows to place procgen swamps during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_RAVINES
info: Allows to place procgen ravines during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_CITIES
info: Allows to place cities during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_FOREST_TRAILS
info: Allows to place procgen forest trails during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_ROADS
info: Allows to place procgen roads during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_SPECIALS
info: Allows to place overmap specials during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_FOREST_TRAILHEADS
info: Allows to place procgen forest trailheads during overmap generation.

name: OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_INIT_STATE
info: If true, initial status and amount of fuel for all spawned vehicles will be overridden by values of VEHICLE_STATUS_AT_SPAWN and VEHICLE_FUEL_AT_SPAWN options.

name: VEHICLE_STATUS_AT_SPAWN
info: All vehicles spawn in this status.  -1 is lightly damaged (default), 0 is undamaged, 1 is disabled (destroyed tires or engine).  Values are read only if OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_INIT_STATE is set to true.

name: VEHICLE_FUEL_AT_SPAWN
info: All vehicles spawn with this percentage of fuel.  0 is empty, 100 is fully loaded, -1 is random amount from 7% to 35% (default).  Values are read only if OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_INIT_STATE is set to true.

name: DESCRIBE_MUSIC_FREQUENCY
info: Determines frequency (in minutes) of displaying music description in sidebar when listening to MP3-players and the like.

name: ETERNAL_WEATHER
info: Sets eternal weather.  Possible values are 'normal', 'clear', 'cloudy', 'light_drizzle', 'drizzle', 'rain', 'rainstorm', 'thunder', 'lightning', 'flurries', 'snowing', 'snowstorm', 'early_portal_storm', 'portal_storm'.  'normal' clears all eternal weather overrides and sets normal weather pattern.  Requires restart of the game after changing value to take effect.

name: SHOW_MUTATION_SELECTOR
info: When mutating, displays a menu which allows players to pick from a list of possible mutations.
